item.title: Regression trees: predicting property prices
item.description: 1 Summary 2 Question 3 Dataset description 3.1 Missing values 3.2 Correlation 4 Regression trees - why use them? 4.1 Variable importance 5 Results 6 What does it mean? 1 Summary To see the code used in this post, visit my kernel on kaggle in R Markdown format. In this post I explore a property dataset from Ames, Iowa. The data describes a set of features for houses.
